languages.text: "Те безумные вопли в лаборатории, все то время, пока я там была... это же был ты, ледышка? Как ты выжил после... после такого?"
"Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"
languages.original_text: "Те безумные вопли в лаборатории, все то время, пока я там была... это же был ты, ледышка? Как ты выжил после... после такого?"

traits.locale_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

languages.text: “我在实验室里的时候，那些疯狂的惨叫声……是你的声音，没错，冰人儿？你是怎么从那样的……折磨中活下来的？”
languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: “我在实验室里的时候，那些疯狂的惨叫声……是你的声音，没错，冰人儿？你是怎么从那样的……折磨中活下来的？”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ces hurlements, dans le laboratoire... c'était vous, n'est-ce pas, le rabat-joie ? Comment avez-vous pu survivre... à ça ? »
languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: « Ces hurlements, dans le laboratoire... c'était vous, n'est-ce pas, le rabat-joie ? Comment avez-vous pu survivre... à ça ? »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Esos gritos desquiciados que oí todo el tiempo que estaba en el laboratorio... eran tuyos, ¿no, hombre de hielo? ¿Cómo has sobrevivido a... todo eso?».
languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: «Esos gritos desquiciados que oí todo el tiempo que estaba en el laboratorio... eran tuyos, ¿no, hombre de hielo? ¿Cómo has sobrevivido a... todo eso?».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「あんな狂気的な叫びが研究室にいる間中、ずっと聞こえてた…あなたには聞こえなかったの、氷の君？どうやって…あれを切り抜けたの？」
languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: 「あんな狂気的な叫びが研究室にいる間中、ずっと聞こえてた…あなたには聞こえなかったの、氷の君？どうやって…あれを切り抜けたの？」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Diese verrückten Schreie im Labor die ganze Zeit über ... das wart Ihr, nicht wahr, Eismann? Wie habt Ihr ... das überlebt?"
languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: "Diese verrückten Schreie im Labor die ganze Zeit über ... das wart Ihr, nicht wahr, Eismann? Wie habt Ihr ... das überlebt?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

languages.text: "Ben oradayken laboratuvardan gelen o haykırışlar... Senden geliyordu, değil mi buz küpü? Oradan nasıl sağ çıktın?"
languages.original_text: "Those crazy screams in the lab, the whole time I was there... that was you, wasn't it, iceman? How did you survive... that?"

traits.locale_text: "Ben orada olduğum süre boyunca laboratuvardan gelen o haykırışlar... Senden geliyordu, değil mi buz küpü? Hayatta kalmayı nasıl başardın?"
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
